item.title: Beware of the free trial
item.description: I was looking at my bank statement last week and something was wrong. I had a charge of $15 for The Service (a big company that I will not name here), a service I hadn’t used for years after I tried one of their free items. Did I cancel it? No, I didn’t think so. But also, I couldn’t remember actually signing up for it. It got worse. Looking back at my previous statements I saw that I was also charged the previous month as well.
